room_title: Escape room "The Wild Wild West" by The Panel Room Escape Games in St. Joseph (MO)
room_address: 107 South 4th Street, 2nd Floor, St Joseph, MO 64501
room_description: The year is 1875. You suddenly find yourself in a fiasco at the rear end of a moving train. Moments before your arrival, a local outlaw loaded your train cabin with some unique red exploding 'candlesâ€™, which only the true villain can extinguish. To prevent a complete catastrophe for all aboard, you and your team must sort through the clues left behind to identify the true bandit and his/her whereabouts before your fuse runs out.
